casebody.data:
Thomas BENTLEY, Employee
v.
JONATHAN PINER CONSTRUCTION, Alleged Employer, Stonewood Insurance Company, Alleged Carrier No. 282P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. December 7, 2017 Robert C. Dodge, Attorney at Law, Beaufort, Rudolph A. Ashton, III, Attorney at Law, New Bern, for Bentley, Thomas. Martin R. Jernigan, Attorney at Law, Michael W. Ballance, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Jonathan Piner Construction, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 21st of August 2017 by Plaintiff in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 7th of December 2017."
